text: Doctor Herbert Edgar Wyndham, better known as the High Evolutionary, is a major antagonist from Marvel Comics. He first appeared in The Mighty Thor #133 from 1966, before steadily becoming one of the many foes towards the Guardians of the Galaxy and the Avengers. == Fictional character biography == He is a mad scientist wanting to make the perfect evolved human by mixing animal and human DNA together. == In other media == Chukwudi Iwuji portrayed the character in the Marvel Cinematic Universe movie Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3 (2023). Category:Marvel Comics characters
title: High Evolutionary
